title: Iran warns of 'devastating response' to Israel attacks
subhead: 'Leave the occupied territories because they will certainly no longer be habitable in the future," and shelters will 'not guarantee security', an Iranian spokesman for the armed forces said on Sunday. Tehran also reported that the intelligence chief of Iran's Revolutionary Guards had been killed in an Israeli strike.

France's first Slow Fashion Week champions a simple, recycled approach to fashion
subhead: Designers and vintage enthusiasts gathered in Marseille from June 7 to June 14, far from the glitz of major fashion capitals, to promote an alternative fashion model where secondhand clothing takes center stage.

title: Paris Saint-Germain thrash Atlético 4-0 in Club World Cup Opener
subhead: PSG largely dominated Atlético at the Rose Bowl on Sunday, in its first match since trouncing Inter Milan 5-0 to win its first Champions League title on May 31.

title: The young professionals taking their parents' experiences to heart and changing how they work
subhead: Between exhaustion, loss of meaning and admiration, the younger generation is shaping its relationship with work after witnessing their parents' professional struggles and the profound transformation of the workplace.

title: War in Ukraine: How FPV drones are transforming the battlefield
subhead: Le Monde has compiled dozens of verified videos from the front lines to document the decisive impact of these low-cost drones.

Europe's paradoxical support for Israel's attack against Iran
subhead: France, the United Kingdom and Germany expressed their support on Friday for Israel's 'right to defend itself' against the nuclear threat posed by the Islamic Republic of Iran, despite deteriorating relations with Benjamin Netanyahu because of his war in Gaza and their stated preference for a diplomatic approach.

title: On the Canadian side of lake Ontario, a new identity emerges in the shadow of Trump
subhead: Straddling the border between Canada and the US, Lake Ontario has long served as a model for the harmonious management of a shared space. But Donald Trump's declarations undermine that balance.

title: The collapse of the 'axis of resistance'
